sources.title: Eyes of the Roshi | Full Action Revenge Movie | Martial Arts
sources.description:
Eyes of the Roshi - SAIGON 1973. A young man's heart is breaking as he discovers his childhood love, the girl he grew up with is murdered. He makes a fateful resolve to avenge her loss, thereby igniting a forty-year odyssey of revenge and death, which ends a continent away in a final climactic confrontation.
2017.  Stars: Eric Roberts, Ethan Marten, Amanda Dunn

metadata.Plot: SAIGON 1973. A young man's heart is breaking as he discovers his childhood love, the girl he grew up with, raped and murdered. He makes a fateful resolve to avenge her loss, thereby igniting a forty-year odyssey of revenge and death, which ends a continent away in a final climactic confrontation.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Baum, Dan Cava, Mari Mann
metadata.Actors: Eric Roberts, Ethan Marten, Amanda Dunn
